game.name: Project Exodus
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A co-op horror game for up to 6 players in which you must hunt monsters and convert them into biomass to meet the quota for "The Ark". Collect artifacts, earn money, and buy upgrades to improve your chances of survival.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A co-op horror game for up to 6 players in which you must hunt monsters and convert them into biomass to meet the quota for "The Ark". Collect artifacts, earn money, and buy upgrades to improve your chances of survival.
